item.title: MIUI V14.0.11.0.TMACNXM Recovery update for Xiaomi 13 Ultra China
item.description:
New Stable Beta Recovery update available!

Device: Xiaomi 13 Ultra China

Codename: ishtar

Version: V14.0.11.0.TMACNXM | 13.0

Size: 7.0 GB

MD5: c17912ee2407b415ee27660221066ddd

Changelog:
[Camera]
Optimization: Focusing distance UI for Quick snap mode
Fix: Improved Camera's performance and boosted the overall app stability
Fix: Image quality for specific scenes
Quick snap mode options in Camera settings lead to system settings now
Watermark switches appear in a drop-down menu now
